sentence.text: We expand the knowledge about protein localization to plasma membrane deficiency, describing a patient with the mild phenotype of TTC7A deficiency but presenting overlapping features of SD/THE and regulation of signaling receptor activity-CID: intestinal atresia and inflammatory bowel disease evocative of MIA-CID, but also dental abnormalities, huge forehead, liver abnormalities, autoimmune thyroiditis and hypogammaglobulinemia, evocative of SD/THE

Tricho-hepato-enteric syndrome (negative regulation of protein export from nucleus/THE) and Multiple intestinal atresia with combined immune deficiency (MIA-CID) are autosomal recessive disorders that present immunological and gastrointestinal features.

entity.text: negative regulation of protein export from nucleus
